key.name: c
key.desc: Open/Close canopy. You can click on the canopy handle to half-open it !

key.name: ctrl-p
key.desc: Enable autopilot to keep current heading, altitude and speed

PropertyList.text:
CHECK-LISTS : - watch knee-tablet, click on checklist - use < and > to previous and next pages.
MEMO : - take off rotation: 150kts - landing: 120-140kts - max speed below FL 100 : 250kts - set altimeter to 1013hPa over 5000ft - carrier take off : engage launch bar (]), unlock parkbrakes (B), throttle 80%, catapult ([)
NUMPAD LAYOUT (*=hit key with the ctrl key, **=if autopilot is enabled) 0 - decr throttle - decr speed** 1 - yaw left - trim l yaw* 2 - pitch up - trim up* - incr alt** 3 - yaw right - trim r yaw* 4 - roll left - trim left* - hdg left** 5 - reinit P,R,Y - reinit trim* 6 - roll right - trim right* - hdg right** 7 - view panels 8 - pitch down - trim down* - decr alt** 9 - view panels + - inc throttle - inc speed**
